程序包 cn.qfys521.time

类 Time

java.lang.Object
cn.qfys521.time.Time
public class Time extends Object
This class provides utility methods for working with time.

    方法
    说明

      public Time()

  • 方法详细资料

    • getNowTime

      public static Date getNowTime()
      Gets the current date and time as a Date object.
      返回:
      The current date and time as a Date object.

    • getNowTimeStr

      public static String getNowTimeStr()
      Gets the current date and time as a formatted string using the default format of the platform.
      返回:
      The current date and time as a formatted string.

    • getNowTimeStr

      public static String getNowTimeStr (String format)
      Gets the current date and time as a formatted string using a specified format pattern.
      参数:
      format - The format pattern string used for formatting the date and time. See SimpleDateFormat for details on format patterns.
      返回:
      The current date and time as a formatted string.

    • getSystemTime

      public static long getSystemTime()
      Gets the current system time in milliseconds since epoch (January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT).
      返回:
      The current system time in milliseconds.

    • getSystemTimeToDate

      public static Date getSystemTimeToDate (long time)
      Converts a system time in milliseconds to a Date object.
      参数:
      time - The system time in milliseconds since epoch.
      返回:
      The Date object representing the provided system time.

    • getSystemTimeStr

      public static String getSystemTimeStr (String format)
      Gets the current system time as a formatted string using a specified format pattern. This method combines getSystemTime() and getSystemTimeToDate(long) internally before formatting.
      参数:
      format - The format pattern string used for formatting the date and time. See SimpleDateFormat for details on format patterns.
      返回:
      The current system time as a formatted string.
